reference.shortdesc: A description is a statement that describes or contains additional information about an object. It can be applied to a table, figure, cross reference, link, and multimedia object.

section.title: Usage information
section.p: The following list outlines some usages of the desc element:

dlentry.dd: Provides more information than can be contained in the title.

dd.p: Provides a description of the target.
Processors MAY choose to display the content of a desc as hover help for a link.

dlentry.dd: Provides alternate content to use when the context does not permit displaying the object.

section.title: Attributes
section.p: The following attributes are available on this element: and .

example.title: Example
example.codeblock: <fig><title>The Handshake</title> <desc>This image shows two hands clasped in a formal, business-like handshake.</desc> <image href="handshake.jpg"> <alt>The handshake</alt> </image> </fig>
